game.name: Iron Blight
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a cold, rainy Eastern Bloc town, you find yourself trapped in a room as abominations claw at your door, with nowhere to run. You must survive the feverish night, uncover the horrors lurking in the shadows and above all, find your wife Valeria.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a cold, rainy Eastern Bloc town, you find yourself trapped in a room as abominations claw at your door, with nowhere to run. You must survive the feverish night, uncover the horrors lurking in the shadows and above all, find your wife Valeria.
